sentence.text: We summarize recent updates on the genes and related clinical syndromes involved in the pathogenesis of early-onset epileptic encephalopathies: Aristaless-related homeobox (ARX), cyclin-dependent kinase-like 5 (regulation of postsynapse organization), syntaxin-binding protein 1 (STXBP1), solute carrier family 25 member 22 (SLC25A22), nonerythrocytic α-spectrin-1 (SPTAN1), phospholipase Cβ1 (PLCβ1), membrane-associated guanylate kinase inverted-2 (positive regulation of receptor internalization), polynucleotide kinase 3'-phosphatase (PNKP), sodium channel neuronal type 1α subunit (SCN1A), protocadherin 19 (homophilic cell adhesion via plasma membrane adhesion molecules), and pyridoxamine 5-prime-phosphate oxidase (PNPO)

entity.text: homophilic cell adhesion via plasma membrane adhesion molecules
